param.name: range
param.default: if this.assignedcontrolled.jobmainsector then this.assignedcontrolled.jobmainsector else this.sector

param.name: minbuy
param.comment: Min gate distance to buy. Buy range supported if $minbuy and $maxbuy are provided

param.name: maxbuy
param.comment: Max gate distance to buy. Buy range supported if $minbuy and $maxbuy are provided

param.name: minsell
param.comment: Min gate distance to sell. Sell range supported if $minsell and $maxsell are provided

param.name: maxsell
param.comment: Max gate distance to sell. Sell range supported if $minsell and $maxsell are provided

param.name: distancecheck
param.comment: Should we compare distances between trade deals?

param.name: ignoretraderules
param.comment: If we trade with a player station, should we ignore trade rules?

param.name: autowares
param.default: if this.assignedcontrolled.isplayerowned then true else false

param.name: illegalwares
param.comment: Enable wares considered illegal in range.

param.name: ignoreshipbuyers
param.comment: Trading with ships is still terrible.

param.name: enablelogbook
param.default: if this.assignedcontrolled.isplayerowned then true else false

param.name: warebasket
param.comment: Manually added wares or job input

debug_to_file.name: this.assignedcontrolled.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'MOD: DeadTater -- Starting Log File -- %s'.[player.age]

debug_to_file.name: this.assignedcontrolled.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'MOD: DeadTater -- %s -- Capacity/MinFill -- Universal: %s -- Container: %s / %s -- Solid: %s / %s -- Liquid: %s / %s'.[player.age,$universalcapacity,$containercapacity,$minfillcontainer,$solidcapacity,$minfillsolid,$liquidcapacity,$minfillliquid]

debug_to_file.name: this.assignedcontrolled.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'MOD: DeadTater -- %s -- Queued up for trade -- Spot in queue %s / %s'.[player.age,global.$DATaterQueue.{this.assignedcontrolled.trueowner}.indexof.{this.assignedcontrolled},global.$DATaterQueue.{this.assignedcontrolled.trueowner}.count]

debug_to_file.name: this.assignedcontrolled.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'MOD: DeadTater -- %s -- Received signal to proceed'.[player.age]

debug_to_file.name: this.assignedcontrolled.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'MOD: DeadTater -- %s -- minbuy %s -- maxbuy %s -- minsell %s -- maxsell %s'.[player.age,$minbuy,$maxbuy,$minsell,$maxsell]

debug_to_file.name: this.assignedcontrolled.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'MOD: TestBlacklistFiltering -- %s -- Buyspace.{%s}.name %s -- (%s)Sector.name %s -- Distance %s -- DeadTaterDelay %s'.[player.age,$a,@$buyspaceswithbanned.{$a}.knownname,$b,@$sector.knownname,this.assignedcontrolled.gatedistance.{$sector}.{$blacklistgroup}.{this.assignedcontrolled},$DeadTaterDelay]

debug_to_file.name: this.assignedcontrolled.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'MOD: TestBlacklistFiltering -- %s -- Buyspace.{%s}.name %s -- (%s)Sector.name %s -- Removed reason -- relation: %s -- travel blacklist: %s -- activity blacklist: %s'.[player.age,$a,@$buyspaceswithbanned.{$a}.knownname,$b,@$sector.knownname,(this.assignedcontrolled.trueowner.relationto.{$sector.trueowner} le -0.32),($sector.isblacklisted.{blacklisttype.sectortravel}.{$blacklistgroup}.{this.assignedcontrolled}),($sector.isblacklisted.{blacklisttype.sectoractivity}.{$blacklistgroup}.{this.assignedcontrolled})]

do_elseif.comment: If we reach here, the sector is fine but what about the route

debug_to_file.name: this.assignedcontrolled.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'MOD: TestBlacklistFiltering -- %s -- Buyspace.{%s}.name %s -- (%s)Sector.name %s -- JumpPath.count %s -- REMOVED BECAUSE INVALID JUMP PATH'.[player.age,$a,@$buyspaceswithbanned.{$a}.knownname,$b,@$sector.knownname,@$range.gatedistance.{$sector}.{$blacklistgroup}.{this.assignedcontrolled}]

do_elseif.comment: this should solve ships trading in sectors within normal range but outside of blacklist range

debug_to_file.name: this.assignedcontrolled.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'MOD: TestBlacklistFiltering -- %s -- Buyspace.{%s}.name %s -- (%s)Sector.name %s -- JumpPath.count %s -- REMOVED BECAUSE JUMP PATH TOO FAR'.[player.age,$a,@$buyspaceswithbanned.{$a}.knownname,$b,@$sector.knownname,@$range.gatedistance.{$sector}.{$blacklistgroup}.{this.assignedcontrolled}]

debug_to_file.name: this.assignedcontrolled.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'MOD: TestBlacklistFiltering -- %s -- Buyspace.{%s}.name %s -- (%s)Sector.name %s -- JumpPath.count %s -- REMOVED BECAUSE INVALID JUMP PATH'.[player.age,$a,@$buyspaceswithbanned.{$a}.knownname,$b,@$sector.knownname,@$jumppath.count]

debug_to_file.name: this.assignedcontrolled.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'MOD: TestBlacklistFiltering -- %s -- Buyspace.{%s}.name %s -- (%s)Sector.name %s -- (%s)JumpPath.name %s'.[player.age,$a,@$buyspaceswithbanned.{$a}.knownname,$b,@$sector.knownname,$c,@$jumppath.{$c}.knownname]

debug_to_file.name: this.assignedcontrolled.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'MOD: TestBlacklistFiltering -- %s -- Buyspace.{%s}.name %s -- (%s)Sector.name %s -- (%s)JumpPath.name %s -- Removed reason -- relation: %s -- travel blacklist: %s'.[player.age,$a,@$buyspaceswithbanned.{$a}.knownname,$b,@$sector.knownname,$c,@$jumppath.{$c}.knownname,(this.assignedcontrolled.trueowner.relationto.{$jumppath.{$c}.trueowner} le -0.32),($jumppath.{$c}.isblacklisted.{blacklisttype.sectortravel}.{$blacklistgroup}.{this.assignedcontrolled})]

debug_to_file.name: this.assignedcontrolled.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'MOD: TestBlacklistFiltering -- %s -- Buyspace.{%s}.name %s -- ADDED TO FINAL BUYSPACES LIST'.[player.age,$a,@$buyspaceswithbanned.{$a}.knownname]

debug_to_file.name: this.assignedcontrolled.idcode

debug_to_file.text: 'MOD: DeadTater -- %s -- Sectors in Range -- Buy: %s -- Sell: %s -- Est DeadTaterDelay Sum: %s'.[player.age,$buyspaces.count,$sellspaces.count,$DeadTaterDelay * ($buyspaces.count + $sellspaces.count)]

debug_to_file.name: this.ship.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'MOD: DeadTater -- %s -- Time spent checking sectors: %s -- Time spent checking buy spaces: %s -- Time spent checking sell spaces: %s -- Time spent in queue: %s'.[player.age,(player.age - $CheckSectorsStartTime - $TotalQueueTime),($CheckSellSpacesStartTime - $CheckBuySpacesStartTime),(player.age - $CheckSellSpacesStartTime),$TotalQueueTime]

debug_to_file.name: this.assignedcontrolled.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'MOD: DeadTater -- %s -- Buy Offer for: %s at %s -- Amount: %s -- Desired Amount: %s -- Offer Amount: %s -- Stock: %s -- Profit: %s -- Payout:%s -- Distance: %s -- Distance Scale: %s -- Scaled: %s -- Highest Grofit: %s -- Available: %s -- Restricted: %s -- MinAmount: %s -- Free Space: %s'.[player.age,$buyoffer.ware,$buyoffer.buyer.knownname,$Amount,$buyoffer.desiredamount,$buyoffer.offeramount,$buyoffer.stocklevel,$Amount*$buycost,$buycost,$distance,$distancescale,$totalearned,$Grofit,$buyoffer.available,$buyoffer.restriction.factions.count,$buyoffer.minamount,$buyoffer.buyer.cargo.{$buyoffer.ware}.free]

debug_to_file.text: 'MOD: DeadTater -- %s -- Time spent checking SellCargo: %s -- Time spent in queue: %s'.[player.age,(player.age - $SellCargoStartTime - $TotalQueueTime),$TotalQueueTime]

debug_to_file.name: this.assignedcontrolled.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'Scanning Buy Offer,Ware:,(%s),Buyer:,%s(%s)(%s),Price:,%s,RelativePrice:,%s,QuantityFactor:,%s,Gate Distance:,%s,Raw Distance:,%s'.[$buyoffer.ware,$buyoffer.buyer.knownname,$buyoffer.buyer.idcode,$buyoffer.buyer.trueowner,$buycost,$buyoffer.relativeprice,$buyoffer.quantityfactor,this.assignedcontrolled.gatedistance.{$buyoffer.buyer}.{$blacklistgroup}.{this.assignedcontrolled},this.assignedcontrolled.distanceto.{$buyoffer.buyer}]

do_if.value: (not $ignoretraderules) and (($selloffer.seller.trueowner == this.assignedcontrolled.trueowner) or ($buyoffer.buyer.trueowner == this.assignedcontrolled.trueowner)) and ($playerowned) and (not ($selloffer.seller.trueowner == $buyoffer.buyer.trueowner))

debug_to_file.name: this.assignedcontrolled.idcode

debug_to_file.text: 'MOD: DeadTater -- %s -- Looks like the trade were looking at is no longer available.'.[player.age]

debug_to_file.text: 'MOD: DeadTater -- %s -- Looks like the trade were looking at is no longer available.'.[player.age]

debug_to_file.text: 'MOD: DeadTater -- %s -- We cant afford this deal anymore'.[player.age]

debug_to_file.text: 'MOD: DeadTater -- %s -- Order: %s -- Failed to find a trade %s times. Waiting before checking again.'.[player.age,this.assignedcontrolled.order.id,$SearchFailed]

debug_to_file.name: this.assignedcontrolled.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'MOD: DeadTater -- %s -- Order: %s -- Failed to find a trade %s times. Waiting before checking again.'.[player.age,this.assignedcontrolled.order.id,$SearchFailed]

debug_to_file.name: this.assignedcontrolled.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'MOD: DeadTater -- %s -- Order: %s -- Failed to find a trade %s times. Notifying player.'.[player.age,this.assignedcontrolled.order.id,$SearchFailed]

debug_text.text: 'MOD: DeadTater -- %s -- Ship: %s(%s) -- Trade failure procedures failed: %s'.[player.age,this.assignedcontrolled.name,this.assignedcontrolled.idcode,if $SearchFailed? then $SearchFailed else 'Null',if $GrofitFound? then $GrofitFound else 'Null', if $StationTrade then $StationTrade else 'Null']
